span.span: Recognized As A District of Distinction

div.strong: Breakfast/lunch meals are available to students that attend the Wharton School District at no cost.

br.strong: The meals are available at the following times:

div.strong: Wednesday (includes Thursday's and Friday's meal)10:30 am -12:30 pm

div.strong: NJ DOE Self Assessment for Determining Grades under the Anti-Bullyng Bill of Rights District and School Report 2017-2018

p.strong: These grades are based upon the district's self-assessment of its HIB programs, training and reporting, in accordance with the Anti-Bullying Bill of Rights Act. The district's HIB policy is available on this website and additional resources and supportive information may be obtained from the guidance counselors (ABS), principals, Dr. Ketch (District Anti-Bullying Coordinator) or the NJ DOE website.
